function.name: send_api_request
function.description: send the API request to get execute an action

url.description: The URL to send the request to

headers.description: The headers to send with the request. It should be a json object

params.description: The query parameters to send with the request. It should be a json object

data.description: The data to send with the request. It should be a json object

body.description: The body to send with the request. It should be a json object
